title: Brand Border
body: I know it seems stupid to notice now, but I never got my border for buy zombie brand when he first came out. Is there any way to fix this or is it too late?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=XBbOTlnq,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-07-13T23:04:32.586+0000)
>
> Unfortunately, it doesn't look like Zombie Brand is a skin that was eligible for a [vintage border.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/plan-vintage-limited-edition-skins)  Zombie brand was already a[ Legacy skin](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/plan-vintage-limited-edition-skins), and wasn't fixed for a border.  Hope that helps clears things up!
> 
> Edit:  What Zombiemaster said.  :P
> 
> {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

I gotcha, I was sitting here today lookin at nids border and was wonderin why brand didnt have one. My bad
Zombie Brand was released as a Legacy skin, not a Limited one, so you were not supposed to get the special border for it.
